description:
*** Lite Edition ***

Hello and welcome to this short course on Microsoft Excel 2010, which is the world's most popular spreadsheet program and the easiest version till date.

..........................................................................................................

Course Highlights:

In this course you will learn to:

  • create an Excel worksheet from scratch
  • insert text and numbers in your worksheets
  • use the Excel formula bar to insert text and numbers
  • insert and format date and time values in your worksheets
  • format columns and rows depending on the type of data they contain
  • use the Excel selection techniques to better store, maintain and analyze your data in your worksheets
  • delete, replace & edit data in your worksheet
  • use the Excel techniques to quickly perform some of the basic calculations in your worksheets

..........................................................................................................

Course Mission:

The mission of this short course is to provide a quick and accessible way for you to learn Microsoft Excel 2010 from ground up and also use it as a quick basic reference guide wherever and whenever you want. I hope that this course fills in multiple roles as both a learning tool and a basic reference once you expand your skills.

..........................................................................................................

Supplementary Files:

Each lecture in this course contains additional supplementary files in the supplementary file section, in order for you to understand the concepts better. In case you want to download a zipped folder of these files and the example worksheets you work on throughout this course, please follow the instructions in lecture #1 to download the zipped folder.

..........................................................................................................

Feedback (Please help me to make this course even better!):

Iâ€™m constantly working on to improve this course. Therefore, if you have any feedback you are welcome to send me a message on Udemy and I will definitely work on to include that in this course.
title: A how to guide in Excel 2010
